Silco said to Marcus: There's an enforcer with her. A girl. Roughly the same age.
Marcus said to Silco: Caitlyn. She's a Kiramman. Just like them, she does whatever she wants. I... can't control her.
Silco said to Marcus: Then of what use are you?
Marcus said to Silco: I'll track her down. I can fix this. Please.

Silco said to Marcus: Everyone makes mistakes, right? What's important is that we don't repeat them. My people are tracking Vi and this... ...Caitlyn. They cannot be allowed to resurface. Do we understand each other?
Marcus said to Silco: Hmm.
Silco said to Ren: Oops. Ah. So sorry. Accidents happen.
Viktor said to Jayce: Watch. It responds to organic matter.
Jayce said to Viktor: Incredible.
Viktor said to Jayce: This is unlike anything we've ever seen, Jayce. It, it, it could be the key to augmenting physiology, extending life...
Jayce said to Viktor: Curing you.
Viktor said to Jayce: It's happened to everyone. I can't determine why. They're... rejecting the transmutation.
Jayce said to Viktor: We'll solve this.
Viktor said to Jayce: There may not be time. We're in uncharted waters here and... I can feel my body... eroding.
Jayce said to Viktor: I'll have Sky bring Heimerdinger. He might know something that could help. In the meantime, we'll do what we do best.
Caitlyn said to Vi: What is this place?
Vi said to Caitlyn: It's where the kind of people you topsiders don't want to think about, wind up. It was never this big, though. There.
Caitlyn said to Vi: I know you have your reservations about me, but this only works if we can trust each other.
Vi said to Caitlyn: It doesn't work. It never has. You topsiders always find a way to screw us.
Caitlyn said to Vi: I suppose topside is to blame for all your misfortunes.
Vi said to Caitlyn: No. Not all of them.
Caitlyn said to Vi: We aren't monsters, you know. We're people, just like you.
Vi said to Caitlyn: You don't know anything about me. I shouldn't have left you.
Caitlyn said to Vi: It's all right. Despite it all, I can tell... you have a good heart.
Heimerdinger said to Viktor: What is that?
Viktor said to Heimerdinger: I'm calling it the Hexcore. It's an adaptive rune matrix. Hextech that evolves.
Jayce said to Heimerdinger: It's groundbreaking. What's most exciting is that it reacts to biological matter. There are stories of healing magic. Our samples thus far have perished...
Heimerdinger said to Jayce: You must destroy it.
Jayce said to Heimerdinger: What?
Heimerdinger said to Jayce: Please, if ever you've put faith in my guidance, hear me now. I've seen nations destroyed by a single seed and it looked... exactly like this.
Jayce said to Heimerdinger: Professor, this could save Viktor's life.
Heimerdinger said to Viktor: Viktor, something's different. You've changed. What did you do?
Viktor said to Heimerdinger: What do you mean, Professor?
Heimerdinger said to Viktor: It's that thing. It must be destroyed!
Jayce said to Heimerdinger: Wait. No. I won't let you.
Heimerdinger said to Jayce: Jayce, this is a violation of the Ethos. I will have it destroyed one way or another.
Jayce said to Heimerdinger: That's your opinion. We'll see if the Council agrees.
Viktor said to Jayce: I might know someone else who could help.
Jayce said to Viktor: You do what you have to. I need to get ready.
Viktor said to Jayce: For what?

shimmer addict said to Caitlyn: Is she all right? Wait, wait, wait! Easy. Easy. That's Vi, right? I'm a friend. Or at least I was. I mean, I... I owed her old man my life. Probably more than that. I guess.
Caitlyn said to shimmer addict: She's bleeding. She needs a doctor.
shimmer addict said to Caitlyn: Not so simple to come by around here. Hey. I'm sorry. Oh, oh. But, ah, I do know someone else who might be able to help. Come with me.
apothecary said to shimmer addict: Ailment?
Caitlyn said to apothecary: Uh... Uh... she's been stabbed.
shimmer addict said to Caitlyn: She makes potions. Helps people here with... ...with this.
Caitlyn said to shimmer addict: Shimmer. Why would you take something that does that to you?
shimmer addict said to Caitlyn: I just... wanted to feel what it was like... To be somebody. To make other people afraid. Instead of...
apothecary said to Caitlyn: Trade.
Caitlyn said to apothecary: Thank you, I really...
Caitlyn said to shimmer addict: Let's go. I think Vi will be happy to see a friendly face.
shimmer addict said to Caitlyn: No, no. You go ahead. She knew me when I was still... Anyway, I don't want her to see me like this. Just tell her, uh, tell her I'm sorry. About everything. Okay?
Marcus said to Jayce: I found this on one of the Firelights. It matches fragments we found outside your lab and at the Hexgates. I... have reason to believe they're planning more attacks.
Jayce said to Marcus: Well, how has this threat gone unnoticed for so long?
Marcus said to Jayce: Since the Hexgates were completed, the fissures haven't been a priority.
Jayce said to Marcus: Oh, we'll settle that later. For now, we need to prevent any further attacks.
Marcus said to Jayce: Short of searching everyone who crosses the bridges. I don't know how we can.
Jayce said to Marcus: Then, that's what we'll do.
Marcus said to Jayce: Are you certain? This sort of an order...
Jayce said to Marcus: Do it. We have to protect the city.
Marcus said to Jayce: One other thing. I saw Caitlyn Kiramman had a prisoner released on your order. Is there anything I can assist with?
Jayce said to Marcus: No. No, uh, we've got it covered.

Heimerdinger said: Councilors, we have lost our way. This city was founded to be a bastion of enlightenment. In a world that cannibalized itself over power and pride. But we've forgotten. Loosened our morals in favor of comfort and convenience. Traded honor for prestige. We were once one tribe. Now we are Houses divided. I believe, if we set aside our greed and arrogance, we can be one again. It will take vigilance. We must hold each other accountable.
Jayce said to Heimerdinger: And who holds you accountable?
Heimerdinger said to Jayce: What?
Jayce said to Heimerdinger: Shimmer is rampant in the undercity. Attacks at the Hexgates and in the Academy Square. Enforcers fear to set foot in the Lanes. All under your watch.
Heimerdinger said to Jayce: Jayce, you forget yourself.

Jayce said to Heimerdinger: I'm sorry, Professor, but healing this city will take more than just speeches. Time and again, you've warned us what not to do. But let me ask you this, what's your plan to fix this?
Heimerdinger said to Jayce: I see what this is about. Your Hextech projects need more time. More safeguards.

Jayce said to Heimerdinger: Humans don't live for centuries. We can't wait for progress. We need a leadership focused on the future, not the past. You are the true Father of Piltover, and your years of service can never be repaid. I believe it's time we gave the beloved founder of our city... a well-deserved retirement.
Heimerdinger said to Jayce: Jayce, don't do this.
Jayce said: It has to be unanimous. All in favor?
Mel said to Heimerdinger: With my deepest respect and appreciation, Professor.
Caitlyn said to Vi: Vi. Easy, easy, easy. We need you back on your feet. What was the name Sevika gave you? Jinx?
Vi said to Caitlyn: Right. Jinx. How could I forget?
Caitlyn said to Vi: We're going to have to be more careful now. Silco will be watching... You used to live here? Who's Powder?
Vi said to Caitlyn: My sister. I thought she died, but, no. I have to try and find her.
Caitlyn said to Vi: How do you not know if your sister is alive or dead?
Vi said to Caitlyn: It's hard to check up on people from inside a concrete cell.
Caitlyn said to Vi: What, you don't have parents?
Vi said to Caitlyn: No! They were killed by enforcers.
Silco said to Vi: Vander's prodigy. I've regretted that we never had the opportunity to speak.
Vi said to Silco: What have you done with my sister?
Silco said to Vi: I've freed her. Candidly, I thought you were the prize of your secondhand family. But Jinx... Oh. She is more than I ever imagined.
Vi said to Silco: I'm gonna find her and erase whatever fucked-up delusions you put in her head. But first, I'm gonna bring your bullshit empire down all around you.
Silco said to Vi: You don't know your limits, girl. It's what got Vander killed. What drove your sister away. And it's why I'm here right now.
Vi said to Silco: Yeah, well... You talk too much.
Singed said to Viktor: Rio will live.
Viktor said to Singed: You did this?
Singed said to Viktor: I thought you understood. The mutation must survive.
Viktor said to Singed: I understand now.
Silco said: How many problems can one girl cause?
Vi said to Jinx: Powder?
Jinx said to Vi: Vi?
Vi said to Jinx: Oh, Powder! I'm so sorry, Powder. I... I tried to come back. I promise, I did. But I... I got arrested.
Jinx said to Vi: Marcus?
Vi said to Jinx: I don't know. I... It doesn't matter. I just... I never thought I'd see you again.
Jinx said to Vi: Are you real?
Vi said to Jinx: Yes, of course. It's me, Vi, your sister. I'm here. I'm right here.
Jinx said to Vi: Things changed when you left. I changed.
Vi said to Jinx: I know, Pow-pow, I know. You did what you had to do to survive. Me too. It's okay. What matters is we're together.
Jinx said to Vi: Who's she?
Caitlyn said to Jinx: Who are you?
Vi said to Jinx: It's okay. She's a friend.
Jinx said to Vi: Sevika wasn't lying? You're with an enforcer?
Caitlyn said to Vi: Your sister is Jinx?
Vi said to Caitlyn: Caitlyn, just listen, we can work this out.
Jinx said to Vi: This is a trick! You're playing me!
Jinx said to Jinx: Shut up! I'm in no mood.
Caitlyn said to Jinx: We didn't say anything.
Jinx said to Caitlyn: I wasn't talking to you!
Vi said to Jinx: Powder, it's okay.
Jinx said to Vi: Stop calling me that. It's Jinx now. Powder fell down a well.
Vi said to Jinx: You're not a jinx. God, I never should have...
Jinx said to Vi: Stop talking to me like I'm a child! Was that why you came? For this stupid stone?
Vi said to Jinx: No, I don't even know what that is, I...
Jinx said to Vi: You're a class act, Sister. Sister. Thought I missed her. Bet you wouldn't miss her.
Vi said to Jinx: Powder! I'm here for you. Only you. You can fire that thing if you want, but I'm not going anywhere. I'm not going to abandon you again.
Jinx said to Jinx: Everyone, shut up, I need to think.
Jinx said to Vi: Do you hear that?
Vi said to Jinx: Powder. Powder!
Ekko said to Firefly 1: Take her.
Powder said: Vi? No!
Caitlyn said to Vi: I knew it was a mistake trusting you.
Vi said to Caitlyn: You've been a real picnic yourself.
Caitlyn said to Vi: I'm not the one who walked us into, not one, but two of Silco's traps.
Vi said to Caitlyn: This isn't Silco, it's someone else.
Caitlyn said to Vi: How do you know?
Vi said to Caitlyn: Cause we'd already be dead.
Caitlyn said to Vi: Oh, very nice. When were you planning to tell me that your lunatic sister works for him?
Vi said to Caitlyn: Just as soon as you came clean about what the hell you're really doing down here.
Caitlyn said to Vi: I told you the truth.
Vi said to Caitlyn: Bullshit. What was that glowing stone? That's what I thought.
Caitlyn said to Vi: What's going on?
Vi said to guard: Hey, stop! Get your hands off of me!
Caitlyn said to guard: Leave her alone!
Vi said to guard: Let me go!
Caitlyn said to guard: Vi? Vi! Vi!
Vi said to guard: Hey.
Vi said to Ekko: You shy? Or just ugly?
Ekko said to Vi: You look good for a dead girl.
Vi said to Ekko: Ekko?
Ekko said to Vi: What do you know about this?
Vi said to Ekko: Nothing. What the hell is this all about?
Ekko said to Vi: What were you doing with Jinx?

Vi said to Ekko: Her name is Powder. And I just found her when you and your goons showed up. It's me. Vi. Same person who used to take you down to the junk heap and hose you down when you got covered in grease.
Ekko said to Vi: That was a long time ago. People change.
Vi said to Ekko: Yeah. I'm getting that.
Ekko said to Vi: Are you working for Silco?
Vi said to Ekko: Fuck. You.
Ekko said to Vi: I thought you were dead. Now you show up with a Piltie and give her a tour of the Lanes?
Vi said to Ekko: You were following us? Why didn't you say something?
Ekko said to Vi: I didn't know if I could trust you.
Vi said to Ekko: So... so you just come out swinging?
Ekko said to Vi: Gee, I wonder who I learned that from?
Vi said to Ekko: Ah, well, you shoulda learned more. You still punch like a little boy.
Ekko said to Vi: And you still block with your face.
Vi said to Ekko: I remember when you wouldn't stand up to me. I missed you, little man.
Ekko said to Vi: How long have you had those off?
Vi said to Ekko: How long have you been whining?
Singed said to Viktor: Hmm. Fascinating. I would very much like to see the device. This, uh, Hexcore.
Viktor said to Singed: That may be difficult to arrange. I've tried every combination of runes, but... it's always the same. The subject, wither and rot.

Singed said to Viktor: Uh, perhaps the error resides not with your calculations but... with your subjects. Nature has made us intolerant to change, but fortunately, we have the capacity to change our nature.
Viktor said to Singed: And this is... Shimmer?
Singed said to Viktor: A variant. It should provide everything one needs to survive a violent transition.
Viktor said to Singed: Will it work on plants?

Singed said to Viktor: You aren't here about the plants, are you? I know the look of a doomed man. I must warn you. If you take this path, they will despise you. Love and legacy are the sacrifices we make for progress. It's why I parted ways with Heimerdinger.
Viktor said to Singed: Jayce will understand.
Singed said to Viktor: Perhaps.
Mel said to Jayce: Hammer work is such a delicate art.
Jayce said to Mel: How'd you find me?
Mel said to Jayce: You're the de facto head of the Council. People notice where you go.
Jayce said to Mel: Huh. Don't remind me.
Mel said to Jayce: This border shutdown has people agitated.

Jayce said to Mel: They should be. Marcus brought this to me. It's an explosive. I tried taking it apart and it nearly killed me. Whoever built it knows exactly what they're doing. This and Shimmer. It's hard to believe what they're capable of.
Mel said to Jayce: Is that what's really bothering you?
Jayce said to Mel: He was my mentor, Mel. And I betrayed him.

Mel said to Jayce: Everything you said about him was true. My family cast me out and yet, part of me still loves them. Heimerdinger will understand eventually. It's your time now, Jayce. No more red tape. You can bring Hextech to the masses, just like you've always dreamed.
Jayce said to Mel: Hmm. First, I have to save Viktor.
Mel said to Jayce: Where is he?
Jayce said to Mel: I don't know. He disappeared. He does that sometimes. No sign of Caitlyn either.
Mel said to Jayce: The Kiramman girl?
Jayce said to Mel: It's just... Uh, never mind.
Mel said to Jayce: Hey. We'll get through this. I'll stall the Council but they'll soon need their leader. In the meantime... Try not to lose your nuts.
Sevika said to Silco: All our business is down. Enforcers are searching anyone who crosses the bridge.
Silco said to Sevika: Marcus is following my orders. Preventing Vi and Caitlyn from returning.
Sevika said to Silco: Or he's finally flipped.
Silco said to Sevika: Hmm.
Sevika said to Silco: The chembarons scheduled an assembly.
Silco said to Sevika: Oh. I've had enough headaches.
Sevika said to Silco: It didn't sound like a request. Where are you going?
Silco said to Sevika: I need to find Jinx.
Sevika said to Silco: Sir.
Silco said to Sevika: What?
Sevika said to Silco: I got more in common with cave lice than Jinx. But let's just say I didn't always see eye-to-eye with my old man.
Silco said to Sevika: And?
Sevika said to Silco: She'll come to you when she's ready.
Silco said to Sevika: Hmm.
Jinx said to Mylo: I didn't lose her! They took her. She was there for me! Not the enforcer. Why would I remember her name? Well, she's just some stupid topsider! Caitlyn. Pow.
kid1 said to kid2: Come on. Go!
kid2 said to kid1: I got it.
kid1 said to kid2: Whoo-hoo!
Vi said to Ekko: Is that real tree?
Ekko said to Vi: Pretty cool, huh? When I first saw it, I knew this was the place. If a single seed could make it down here, so could we.
Vi said to Ekko: You built all this?
Ekko said to Vi: Not alone. After Vander...died, Silco flooded the lanes with Shimmer. He didn't care what it did to people. Everyone here was an addict or a victim.
kid1 said to Ekko: Hi.
Ekko said to Vi: They needed somewhere safe to start again.
Vi said to Ekko: I should have been there. For you. For everyone.
Ekko said to Vi: That's a good way to drive yourself crazy. If I just went with you that day, maybe none of this would have happened.
Vi said to Ekko: Or maybe you'd be dead. Or... changed.
Ekko said to Vi: Powder's gone, Vi. All that's left is Jinx and she belongs to Silco.
Vi said to Ekko: You're wrong. She's still in there. I can reach her.
Ekko said to Vi: You can't.
Vi said to Ekko: I know my sister.

Ekko said to Vi: I got one more thing to show you. This is everyone we've lost. The price of our freedom. Some of it was Enforcers. Most was Silco. Your sister works for him not because she has to, but because she wants to. I'm sorry, but that's who she is now. Let us through! Come on! We understand. Just stand down!
Jayce said to Marcus: Thank you for alerting me, Sheriff.
Marcus said to Jayce: Not a problem, Councilor.
Viktor said to Jayce: Jayce, what is this?
Jayce said to Viktor: Do you have any idea how this looks? I order a blockade and my own partner violates it?
Viktor said to Jayce: You ordered this? Why?
Jayce said to Viktor: There are people down there who seem hell-bent on destroying us. What were you doing?
Viktor said to Jayce: I was consulting a friend about our quandary. I told you, I knew someone.
Jayce said to Viktor: Well, you didn't say they were from the undercity.
Viktor said to Jayce: What difference does that make?
Jayce said to Viktor: What diff... They're dangerous.
Viktor said to Jayce: I'm from the undercity.
Jayce said to Viktor: You're right. I'm sorry. I've had a lot on my plate. Was your friend able to help?
Viktor said to Jayce: No. No, he said, "Nature was resistant to this sort of tampering."
Jayce said to Viktor: All right, we'll keep at it.
Finn said: First, this wild attack in the heart of Piltover. Now, the border's closing. We're bleeding money and for what? His dreams of rebellion? He's losing control. If we stand together...
Silco said to Finn: We aren't due for an assembly.
Finn said to Silco: We should be. Ever since your stunt topside, profits have been plummeting. Topsiders are too afraid to cross.
Finn said to Silco: We're all wondering, what's your plan to fix this?
Silco said: You're all wondering, are you?
Finn said to Silco: Way I see it, we should cut a deal and give back the Gemstone. Better to have some trade than none at all.
Silco said to Finn: The border issue is temporary. Jinx will deal with it.
Finn said to Silco: Huh. Rumor is, your dog's off her leash. How you meant to bring Piltover to heel if you can't handle your own people, huh?

Silco said: Oh, you don't recognize it? Have you forgotten where we came from? The mines they had us in? Air so thick it clogged your throat. Stuck in your eyes. But I pulled you all up from the depths. Offered you a taste of topside. And fresh air. I gave you life. Purpose. But you've grown fat and complacent. Too much time in the sun.
Silco said to Finn: We came from a world where there was never enough to go around, Finn.
Silco said: That is why we fight. Do you remember?
Finn said to Silco: Sorry. Please. Please.
Silco said to Finn: Don't forget again.
Silco said: Good meeting.
Elora said to Mel: I've had word from our friends overseas. This threat from the undercity is drawing attention. Piltover looks vulnerable.
Mel said to Elora: It's too soon. Jayce isn't ready.
Elora said to Mel: There's one other thing. This arrived for you.
kid said to Caitlyn: Hmm?
Caitlyn said to Ekko: What have you done with Vi? Listen, let her go. I brought her here. It's me you want.
Vi said to Caitlyn: My hero.
Caitlyn said to Vi: You're... But I thought you... I thought they were hurting you!
Ekko said to Caitlyn: Vi tells me I can trust you. You get a pass back topside, that's it. Let's go.
Jinx said to Silco: Let me help you with that.
Silco said to Jinx: Where've you been, Jinx?
Jinx said to Silco: Oh, you know. Here, there, chasing down dead ends. And guess what? They're not all dead.
Silco said to Jinx: I can explain.
Jinx said to Silco: Don't move, silly. I might hurt you.
Silco said to Jinx: I didn't know. Marcus never told me she was in Stillwater.
Jinx said to Silco: But you found out she came back. You lied.
Silco said to Jinx: I wanted to protect you.
Jinx said to Silco: From what?

Silco said to Jinx: She and the enforcer are back for the crystal. Not for you. Have you forgotten how she left you? Who found you? Who cared for you? Gave you a home? I am your family. Everyone else betrays us. I need you. Now more than ever. You have to complete the weapon.
Caitlyn said to Vi: It's beautiful.
Ekko said to Caitlyn: If your people had your way, it'd be rubble and ash.
Caitlyn said to Ekko: It's a misunderstanding. They think you work for Silco.
Ekko said to Caitlyn: Your people hunt us like animals. Silco pays them to do it.
Caitlyn said to Ekko: That's not possible. You're wrong.
Ekko said to Caitlyn: Say that one more time.
Vi said to Ekko: Ekko, she believes what she's saying, okay? She's not your enemy.
Ekko said to Vi: Oh, yeah? Then what's this?
Caitlyn said to Ekko: You got it. You have to let me take that back.
Vi said to Caitlyn: What is it?
Caitlyn said to Vi: It's a Gemstone. It was stolen during the attack. By your sister.
Vi said to Caitlyn: You just forgot to mention that?
Caitlyn said to Vi: With this, someone with the right knowledge could build any Hextech device. If enforcers are becoming more... aggressive, that's why.
Ekko said to Caitlyn: We could beat Silco with this.
Caitlyn said to Ekko: That won't solve things.
Ekko said to Caitlyn: Easy for you to say. Your people aren't dying all around you.

Caitlyn said to Ekko: Ekko, it's wrong what's been done to you. You'd be well within your rights to keep it. I couldn't blame you. But... if you do, this cycle of violence will never stop. This is our best shot at setting the record straight. This city needs healing. More than I ever realized. Please, let me help you.
Ekko said to Caitlyn: You got a plan?
Caitlyn said to Ekko: I have a friend on the council. Let me take the Gemstone to him. He'll listen to me. Your people wouldn't have to hide anymore.
Ekko said to Caitlyn: One condition. I'm the one who gives it to them.
Viktor said to Jayce: Um, the form is crude, but uh, the engineering is... inspired.
Jayce said to Viktor: You think they could crack Hextech?
Viktor said to Jayce: Mm. It's a leap.
Mel said to Jayce: It's been suggested that they may have found a way to utilize the Gemstone. If we are to assume the worst, that would mean they've turned it into a weapon.
Jayce said to Mel: Well, do we know this for certain?
Mel said to Jayce: We can't afford to wait to find out.
Viktor said to Mel: Wait. What are you suggesting?
Mel said to Jayce: We should prepare our own countermeasures.
Jayce said to Mel: You want us to build weapons?
Viktor said to Mel: Absolutely not. That is not why we invented Hextech.
Jayce said to Mel: We would shatter any attempt at peace. Heimerdinger would never go for this.

Mel said to Jayce: Heimerdingers' inaction is what brought us here. You said so yourself. The peace is already broken, Jayce. I'm only asking you to prepare to defend your people. If we're lucky, we'll never need to use it. The decision is yours.
Viktor said to Jayce: Ridiculous. You cannot be considering this.
Jayce said to Viktor: What if she's right? Are we just gonna stand by while they attack us?
Viktor said to Jayce: We're scientists, not soldiers.
Jayce said to Viktor: We have the knowledge to defend ourselves.
Viktor said to Jayce: We agreed Hextech was to improve lives, not to take them.
Jayce said to Viktor: We may not have a choice.
Viktor said to Jayce: There is always a choice.
Jayce said to Viktor: I need to think.
Caitlyn said to Vi: What are they?
Vi said to Caitlyn: We call them firelights. Never seen so many though.
Jayce said to Talis: I'm worried I have to do something I never thought I would.
Ekko said to Vi: Vi?
Vi said to Ekko: I can't leave her again.
Ekko said to Vi: You can't change her.
Vi said to Ekko: I have to try.
Ekko said to Vi: Don't get yourself killed.
Vi said to Ekko: No promises.
Vi said to Caitlyn: It's been real, Cupcake. Thanks. For everything.
Jinx said to Mylo: Shut up. It's just a goodbye hug. She wouldn't do that. Not again.
Marcus said to Caitlyn: Halt! What the hell is this?
Caitlyn said to Marcus: Sir! I have proof. Silco's behind everything.
Marcus said to Caitlyn: Show me.
Ekko said to Caitlyn: No.
Caitlyn said to Ekko: Hmm.
Ekko said to Caitlyn: Shit.
Vi said to Caitlyn: Caitlyn!
Jinx said to Vi: Liar.
Marcus said to Caitlyn: I told you to leave this alone. Tell my... Tell my daughter I...
Ekko said to Vi: Go!
Jinx said to Ekko: Oh, look who it is. The boy savior. Hah. Yes! No.

Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: When I was ten, your grandfather brought me to the aftermath He offered me a gold coin for every blade I retrieved from the fallen. Said we needed the steel. But I knew it was a lie. He wanted me to know death.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: Kino says war is a failure of statecraft.

Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: Your brother thinks he can talk his way out of anything. He fancies himself a fox among the wolves. But mark me, child, if you want to last in this world, you must learn to be both the fox and the wolf.

Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: We'll paint the walls in gold. Import crystal chandeliers. Advisors will enter here, but the regent will have her own, secret entrance. She should have a kind, fat face. Clever, to charm her subjects, but pliable so we can mold her.
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: Perhaps, she could be my daughter.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: You'd give me a throne?
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: I will give you the world, child, if you prove you can take it. What should we do with her?
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: She won't make trouble for us. Strip her of her possessions and send her to the far colonies.
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: She's a symbol of the old regime. Kill her now, and only one must die. Let her live and you may need to kill thousands.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: We can show the people we are merciful.
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: A wolf has no mercy.
Vi said to Caitlyn: Will you be okay? I'll be right back.
Caitlyn said to Vi: Okay.
Silco said: Jinx!
Caitlyn said to Vi: It's gone.
Vi said to Caitlyn: What?
Caitlyn said to Vi: It was all for nothing.
sergeant said to Jayce: Sir, we've secured the area. I've got orders to escort you back into the city. Sir? Are you all right?
Vi said to Caitlyn: Who lives here? Another Councilor friend of yours?
Mrs. Kiramman said to Caitlyn: Caitlyn!
Mr. Kiramman said to Caitlyn: Oh. We were so worried. Thank goodness you're safe!
Mrs. Kiramman said to Caitlyn: And you found a stray.
Caitlyn said to Mrs. Kiramman: This is Vi. She's from the undercity.
Mrs. Kiramman said to Caitlyn: So I see. Could we have a word, Caitlyn? In private.
Caitlyn said to Mrs. Kiramman: You have to speak to the Council.
Mrs. Kiramman said to Caitlyn: Speak to the Council? You understand you've broken several laws?
Mr. Kiramman said to Mrs. Kiramman: She was doing what she thought was right.
Caitlyn said to Mrs. Kiramman: I'll take responsibility.
Mrs. Kiramman said to Caitlyn: You're a Councilor's daughter. Your actions reflect on the entire body.

Caitlyn said to Mrs. Kiramman: My actions? You know what else reflects on the Council? Its citizens living on the streets. Being poisoned. Having to choose between a kingpin who wants to exploit them and a government that doesn't give a shit.
Mrs. Kiramman said to Caitlyn: Caitlyn!
Mr. Kiramman said to Mrs. Kiramman: I'm sure our daughter could use some rest after her adventures.
Mrs. Kiramman said to Caitlyn: I'll schedule an audience.
Caitlyn said to Mrs. Kiramman: Thank you.
Mrs. Kiramman said to Caitlyn: You and your friend can address the Council yourselves. I'd suggest you prepare accordingly.
Singed said to Silco: Her injuries are severe.
Silco said to Singed: You think I can't see that?
Singed said to Silco: Huh. I believe I can save her, but the process will be demanding. Sometimes death is a mercy.
Silco said to Singed: She can take it.
Singed said to Silco: And before I begin, I must know... Are you prepared to lose her?
Silco said to Singed: Jinx? Jinx! She won't die, Doctor. She can't.
Singed said to Silco: I understand. Please understand, this is for your own sanity. I, too, once had a daughter.
Sevika said to Finn: Silco isn't taking guests.

Finn said to Sevika: Not a problem. Wasn't here for him. Thought I might bend your ear. You know when I ask my mates what Silco's up to, your name's first out of their mouths. Sevika's out in the harbor, or "Sevika paid the knuckleheads a visit." You're a scary lady.
Sevika said to Finn: Get to your point.
Finn said to Sevika: Run a tight ship, don't you? Except it's not your ship. It's his and Jinx's.
Sevika said to Finn: This is your plan? Undermine Silco by making a half-assed play at my ego? Gotta hand it to you, Finn. Every time I think you can't get dumber, you dig a new low.

Finn said to Sevika: Let's be plain, then. He's slipping. The undercity's devolving to chaos. And somehow, I get the feeling he isn't up there balancing booksheets. Jinx gets a whim, suddenly his spine's made of jelly. And here you are, shoveling his shit. Ego is one thing, brain's another. You aren't the only one dissatisfied with his performance. There's bigger fish than Silco.
Mrs. Medarda said: Mel. Elora. You didn't have to come out to meet me.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: What are you doing here, Mother?
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: Can I not visit? I've heard stories of Piltover's hospitality.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: You didn't sail halfway across the continent to sample the local cuisine.
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: It's been over a decade, Mel.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: Since you banished me?
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: Such drama. I sent you here to oversee our family's interests and grow yourself. Which you have.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: You said, "Perhaps, your sentimentality will be more at home with those soft-spined idealists overseas."
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: You have your father's memory.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: Don't try to ingratiate yourself with me.
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: Mel.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: Or that.
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: Your brother's gone.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: What happened?
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: He crossed the wrong man. I was distracted. That's a mistake I can't take back. Your Jayce Talis has turned his eye to Hextech weaponry.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: I knew it.
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: War is coming. You've let the problems of your undercity fester too long.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: Piltover isn't like Noxus. War isn't our first and every recourse. I sponsored Hextech to protect the city, not burn it to the ground.
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: It's not conjecture, it's a fact. Weapons can't be unmade and they are always used. I'm here to help guide you to the right decisions.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: I don't need your guidance.
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: We'll see.
boy said to Mrs. Medarda: Miss Medarda?
Mel said: Yes?
Mrs. Medarda said: Yes?
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: He's for me, dear. I'm off to sample the local cuisine.
Caitlyn said to Vi: We'll present our case to the Council tonight.
Vi said to Caitlyn: You did all this yourself? Without even going down there? And I thought Powder could get obsessed.
Caitlyn said to Vi: What happened to her, it's not your fault.

Vi said to Caitlyn: When my parents were still alive... me and Powder used to share a bed like this. Except, maybe, half the size. We played a game where we pretended to be bigger and bigger monsters. So she would say, "I'm a slug monster with venom for ooze." And I'd say, "Well, I'm a slug-eating crab with razor spikes." Sometimes, I... I'd get carried away and she'd get scared. I didn't want her to start crying and wake my parents up, so... I pretended to chase my own monsters away. I'd say... No monster's gonna get you when I'm here. Then a real monster showed up. And I just ran away. I left her.
Vi said to Jinx: You know, Powder, you're stronger than you think.
Jinx said: Vi? No! No, no. No!
Singed said to Jinx: I understand this must be painful.
Jinx said: No!
Singed said to Jinx: I'm afraid it will only get worse.
Jinx said: Wait! No!
Silco said to Singed: What have you done?
Singed said to Silco: I saved her life. Move.
Heimerdinger said: Oh.
Heimerdinger said: Hmm. Huh?
Heimerdinger said: Like this. Bye...
Heimerdinger said: Oh, ingenious. Though these blades seem improperly pitched.
Ekko said to Heimerdinger: You're wrong. It's designed for the fissures. The air is denser.
Heimerdinger said to Ekko: Oh. Are you all right, lad?
Ekko said to Heimerdinger: Yeah, I'm fine, I just sprained my ankle. Are you Councilor Heimerdinger?
Heimerdinger said to Ekko: It's just Heimerdinger now.
Ekko said to Heimerdinger: What are you doing on this side of the river?
Heimerdinger said to Ekko: I wanted to offer my assistance to the citizens of the undercity, but... it seems I'm unwelcome. What is it?
Ekko said to Heimerdinger: We're having the exact same day.
Heimerdinger said to Ekko: That looks like more than a sprain. You need medical attention.
Ekko said to Heimerdinger: I have to get home. It isn't safe for me here. I don't know how I'm gonna get there with my leg busted, and, well... you're holding my ride.
Mrs. Medarda said to Jayce: Do they teach military history at your Academy, Mr. Talis?
Jayce said to Mrs. Medarda: It's, um, Councilor Talis. And I'm not sure.
Mrs. Medarda said to Jayce: The Alornian General Sonnem Parlec used to find ways to meet his enemies blindfolded. He said a man's mind hides behind his body. Somehow, I doubt he ever tried this.
Jayce said to Mrs. Medarda: You're Mel's mom.
Mrs. Medarda said to Jayce: Among other things.
Mrs. Medarda said: Squeeze, child. You won't break it.
Jayce said to Mrs. Medarda: I do have other matters, so if you'll excuse me...
Mrs. Medarda said to Jayce: The threat of the undercity is real. Your leadership is impotent.
Jayce said to Mrs. Medarda: We may not be Noxus, but Piltover isn't as helpless as you think.
Mrs. Medarda said to Jayce: Who said anything about Piltover? The Council is the problem. The mind hiding behind the body. Navigating your current crisis requires expertise you lack.

Jayce said to Mrs. Medarda: Do you know what the success rate for senior Academy inventors is? Three percent. We're no strangers to failure. What makes this the City of Progress is that we keep trying until we get it right. So thank you for your advice, Mrs. Medarda, but I have a city to run.

Mrs. Medarda said to Jayce: Wait. I see why this province and my daughter have fallen for you. You have the passion of youth. I have experience. I want you to succeed here, Jayce, to grace the world with Hextech. But if you don't accept certain realities, I fear you'll end up like General Parlec. Slaughtered with your eyes closed. they intend to delay shipments until fall to give things "time to cool off."
Mrs. Kiramann said: We have greater concerns than a dip in profits. The Sheriff betrayed us. We need better information.
Jayce said: We need to act. Before anyone else gets killed. What could anyone in the undercity offer him that he didn't have up here?
Caitlyn said: It's not what they offered him, it's what he had to lose.
Mrs. Kiramann said: Councilors, my daughter has a unique insight into our situation.

Caitlyn said: Thank you. Councilors, this is Vi. She was born in the undercity. Even though we failed her in countless ways, she risked everything to show me what life is really like down there. People are starving, sick, ravaged by Shimmer. They live in constant fear of the coordinated efforts of violent crime lords. One man leads these efforts. Silco. They yielded no such level of organization.
Caitlyn said: And who led these investigations?
Jayce said: What does this Silco even want from us?
Caitlyn said: He believes the undercity should be independent. He calls it the Nation of Zaun.
Jayce said: What about these? Do you know who made them?
Caitlyn said: No, well... Uh...
Vi said: Her name is Jinx.
Jayce said: This Jinx has the Gemstone? Then we have to go in by force.
Mel said: That could trigger war.
Caitlyn said: There are good people down there. Even if we wanted to invade, they have Shimmer.
Jayce said: We have Hextech.
Caitlyn said: What happened to you?
Jayce said: We've been talking about talking for weeks now. They're still cleaning the blood off the bridge. When do we say enough is enough?
Mel said: Jayce, you don't know war. I do. It must be our last resort. There may be a diplomatic solution.
Vi said: What? You want to negotiate with him?
Mrs. Kiramann said: It may be the only way to avoid further bloodshed.
Vi said: This is insane. Did you learn nothing? You can't talk to him! He hates you. Everything you stand for. He will never back down.
Vi said: Forget it. I remember where your fancy damn door is.
Caitlyn said to Vi: Vi! Wait! Wait! Where are you going?
Vi said to Caitlyn: I don't know. Back where I came from? Seems like that's what everyone up here wants.
Caitlyn said to Vi: I can fix this.
Vi said to Caitlyn: You can't! This is how things are. How they've always been. I was so stupid to think it could change.
Caitlyn said to Vi: There must be something else we can do. Some other way. We'll make a new plan. We have to try.
Vi said to Caitlyn: We tried. Okay? It wasn't enough. Topside and bottom. Oil and water. That's all there is.
Caitlyn said to Vi: What about us?
Vi said to Caitlyn: Oil and water. Wasn't meant to be.
Caitlyn said to Vi: You're just saying that.
Vi said to Caitlyn: Do yourself a favor, Cupcake. Go back to that big, shiny house of yours and just... forget me, okay?

Sky said: Viktor, I've been working on a private project for a couple weeks now. No. Viktor, I've been working on this for a year now and... Viktor. Viktor, I was hoping you might take a look at something I've been working on. Viktor... I was inspired by your... Everything you do inspires me.
Sky said to Viktor: Viktor! Viktor!
Viktor said: Sky? Sky? No. No! That... that can't... that can't...
Vi said to Jayce: You want to make Silco pay for what he's done?
Jayce said to Vi: I could have you arrested.
Vi said to Jayce: You guys really like to bandy that threat around. You ever been to Stillwater?
Jayce said to Vi: No.
Vi said to Jayce: So you just wave an arm, have someone dragged off, don't bother to find out what it does to someone being stuffed in a stone box for weeks, or months, or even years?
Jayce said to Vi: Yeah. I want to make Silco pay.
Vi said to Jayce: I want in.
Jayce said to Vi: There is no in. You heard the Council.
Vi said to Jayce: Fuck the Council. You said you were tired of doing nothing. That's the only sensible thing that came out of anyone's mouth tonight.
Jayce said to Vi: I'm not a vigilante.
Vi said to Jayce: No, you're a victim. Huh... This so people notice you when you raise your hand in the boardroom?
Jayce said to Vi: We built them for mining the fissures.
Vi said to Jayce: Hmm. Someone close to me had a pair of these. You're the first person Caitlyn looked for when we made it to topside. Of everyone up here, you're the one she trusted to do something.
Jayce said to Vi: What do you want me to do? Arrest him?
Vi said to Jayce: Silco controls the undercity with Shimmer. Shut down his supply, and it's only a matter of time before his own people turn on him.
Jayce said to Vi: And how do we do that?

Vi said to Jayce: Take out his manufacturing facilities. Hit them hard and fast, before he can react. So... We got a deal, pretty boy? Over the bridge. Secured! Get back! You little punk. Hey! Hmm. Hmm.
Vi said to Jayce: You didn't have a choice. He knew what he was signing up for.
Jayce said to Vi: We're done here.
Vi said to Jayce: We haven't even scratched the surface. Silco's still out there.
Jayce said to Vi: Do you not understand? I am part of this now! The next parents who get a message their kid isn't coming home... I don't even know where to take it. Do we just leave him here?

Vi said to Jayce: You've always been a part of this. You just never had to look it in the eye. One dead kid? There's hundreds more where he came from, thanks to Silco, and thanks to people like you who stuck their heads in the dirt.
Jayce said to Vi: This is over.
Vi said to Jayce: Not for me.
Jayce said to Vi: Take those off.
Vi said to Jayce: Make me.
Jayce said to Vi: I can't let you leave with them.
Vi said to Jayce: Then, I guess you're gonna need to kill another trencher.
Jayce said to Vi: You won't make it alone.
Sevika said to Silco: Been a while since topside's gotten this bold.
Silco said to Sevika: Say what you want about the late Sheriff. He had his uses.
Sevika said to Silco: Too bad Jinx didn't think so.
Silco said to Sevika: We'll buy another.
Renni said to Silco: You gonna do anything about that piece of shit that murdered my boy? Let me guess, "Jinx will take care of it." Just like she's been taking care of everything else.
Silco said to Renni: We all mourn the loss of your son, Renni. At least, we have the solace of knowing he died fighting for our cause, instead of some petty personal dispute, as so often occurs here.
Renni said to Silco: You're one to talk about sacrificing for the cause. Where is Jinx anyhow?
Silco said to Renni: Help her with the body.

Sky said: Viktor, I know this will probably never see the light of day but watching how you work so tirelessly to make the world a better place... Well, I couldn't forgive myself if I never tried. Everyone's gotta do their part, right?
Mrs. Medarda said: Okay. Noxian wine is bold by comparison. The grapes are hardened by the climate. But then, so is everything that manages to survive in Noxus.
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: Mel, would you like...
Mel said: Leave.
Mrs. Medarda said: Hmm.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: Stay away from Jayce!
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: You really are fond of him.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: Better yet, march back to your ship and get the hell out of my city.

Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: Get ahold of yourself. I taught you better. We're in trouble, Mel. The man who killed your brother doesn't believe the score is settled, and his resources exceed ours. If there is a chance Hextech can be weaponized, we must have it.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: Piltover isn't your testing ground.
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: I've only accelerated the process you started.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: I wanted to protect the city from people like you. I can't believe you'd start a war just to cover your ass.
Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: I would set the world ablaze to protect our family.
Mel said to Mrs. Medarda: No. I stopped being part of this family the moment you cast me out. Why? Why did you do it?

Mrs. Medarda said to Mel: Because you weakened me! I couldn't endure the look in your eyes whenever I made the decisions, the necessary decisions to keep us safe! We need that weapon, Mel. Let the war unfold. And you come home, take your place at my side. It's where you belong.
Viktor said: I'm sorry. I don't know where you'd have preferred. I'm sorry.
Jayce said to Viktor: Am I interrupting? Remember the Distinguished Innovators competition?
Viktor said to Jayce: I remember you notching gears in the carriage over.
Jayce said to Viktor: They started cranking the engine and the whole thing was rattling. I thought a loose cog was gonna take someone's eye out.
Viktor said to Jayce: At least, you didn't throw up.
Jayce said to Viktor: Everything made sense then.
Viktor said to Jayce: You have to destroy it.
Jayce said to Viktor: I know.
Viktor said to Jayce: The Hexcore. I... I can't do it. You have to. Please.
Jayce said to Viktor: What about your disease? Without the Hexcore...
Viktor said to Jayce: Promise me.
Jayce said to Viktor: Okay. Okay. I promise.
Viktor said to Jayce: We lost ourselves. Lost our dream. In the pursuit of great, we failed to do good. We have to make it right.
Silco said: I'm busy.

Finn said to Silco: When you took Vander out of play, I thought, Now here's a man who understands what it takes to run an enterprise. The attitude, the instinct, the eye. The whole package, you were. Always two steps ahead. But time's lapped you, old man.
Silco said to Renni: You're with him, are you?
Renni said to Silco: You screwed up, Silco.

Silco said: You're too young to remember what the undercity was before it became an "enterprise". We had nothing. You know what bore us through those times? Loyalty. Brothers and sisters back-to-back against whatever the world threw at us. Now I'm forced to share the air with parasites like you, who leach off their legacies.
Finn said to Silco: Today's the day you die, Silco.
Silco said to Finn: That's a risk I've known all my life. But I still believe in loyalty.
Silco said to Renni: I would have had your son killed for this. Though I suppose we're ahead on that account. Get out.
Silco said to Sevika: Were you tempted?
Sevika said to Silco: Not for a worm like him. But he won't be the last.
Silco said: Hmm.
Silco said to Jayce: Perfect place for an ambush. And you without your hammer.
Jayce said to Silco: I was reminded recently of what brought us together in the first place. The threats beyond our walls.
Silco said to Jayce: This city has a short memory.

Jayce said to Silco: Progress. Far be it from me to stand in the way. Free trade routes, blanket amnesty,
unrestricted access to the Hexgates, sovereignty. Do you really think you're in a position to demand all this?
Silco said to Jayce: I give you credit for your stunt, boy. Didn't think you had the stomach. But the big display followed by a request for parley, you're tipping your hand. You're afraid.

Jayce said to Silco: I am afraid. Today, I got a glimpse of what war between us might look like. Your people wouldn't stand a chance. The Council couldn't care less. I'm trying to save you from annihilation.
Silco said to Jayce: Well, well. Not the fresh-faced Academy pledge, are you? You want peace, this is the price.
Jayce said to Silco: You'll discontinue the production of Shimmer?
Silco said to Jayce: Half there already.
Jayce said to Silco: Return the Gemstone. And I need Jinx. She has to pay for what she's done.
Silco said to Jayce: They weren't her crimes. She was working for me.

Jayce said to Silco: Believe me, if I had it my way, it'd be you rotting in Stillwater, but we can't make a deal with a snake and cut off its head. We both have our shitty parts to play. Get me Jinx. And I'll give you your nation of Zaun.
Heimerdinger said: Astonishing.
Heimerdinger said to Ekko: You say all this came about in your own brief lifespan? How were you able to accomplish so much so quickly?
Ekko said to Heimerdinger: You'd be surprised what you can pull off when your life depends on it.
Heimerdinger said to Ekko: Uh, why this form? Surely, there are more efficient and safer methods of transportation. Huh? Hmm?
Heimerdinger said to Ekko: Oh.
Ekko said to Heimerdinger: It's not enough to give people what they need to survive, you have to give them what they need to live.

Silco said: A thousand times I've imagined this moment. Never like this. All we ever wanted. The boy didn't even haggle. And what do I lose but problems? Oh, it all makes sense now, brother. Is there anything so undoing as a daughter? Piss off.
Sevika said: Everyone out.

Vander said to Vi: Well, your guard needs working. I wish I could say it gets easier, kiddo. But I'd be lying. What I can say is... She still needs you. They all do. So what do you say? That's my girl.
Vi said: Silco.
Jinx said to Vi: Bravo, sis.

Jayce said: My recent unsanctioned activities in the underground have shown me two things. I'm not fit to govern the people who live there. And neither are you. Our opportunity to demonstrate our compassion, our dedication, our solidarity has passed. They're right not to trust us.
Mrs. Kiramann said: You're walking a fine line, Jayce.
Jayce said: With respect, I don't give a shit what any of you think of me anymore.
Jayce said to Mel: Except you. You were right. You were always right.
Jayce said: My days here are numbered, but I've come with Viktor, my partner and a Zaunite, with one final proposal.
Viktor said: Jayce has brokered a peace with Silco. In exchange for the undercity's independence.
Mrs. Kiramann said: What? Nonsense! We have procedures...
Jinx said: Really thought I buried this place. But I should have known better.
Vi said to Jinx: Powder?
Jinx said: Nothing ever stays dead.
Vi said to Jinx: Are we alone?

Jinx said to Vi: For now. Maybe forever. Wanna know a secret? Silco thinks he made Jinx, with all his rants and his hard-won lessons. Excise your doubts, Jinx. Be what they fear, Jinx. Like everything was the same as when Vander left him. But he didn't make Jinx. You did.
Vi said to Jinx: I'm sorry, Powder. I never meant to leave you.

Jinx said to Vi: You never left. I always heard you. Shadows in the streets, prickles on the back of my neck. Your voice. Pushing me. Picking me up when all the colors were black. You're the reason I'm still alive.

Vi said to Jinx: I spent so many nights in that shitty prison. On the freezing floor, hungry, bloody, counting the hours. The only thing... The only thing that kept me going was the thought of getting back to you.
Jinx said to Vi: Are we still sisters?
Vi said to Jinx: Nothing is ever going to change that.
Jinx said to Vi: I always knew you'd come back.
Vi said to Jinx: What's going on?
Silco said: No.
Jinx said to Vi: He took everything from us. Right here, he stabbed Vander in the back. Just like he planned to do with me.
Jinx said to Silco: Liar.
Jinx said: Mm. We're missing someone.
Vi said: Huh?
Jinx said to Vi: I paid your girlfriend a visit this morning.
Vi said to Jinx: What did you do?
Jinx said to Vi: I made her a snack.
Vi said to Jinx: Huh? No!
Jinx said to Vi: Sheesh. I'm not that crazy.
Vi said to Jinx: Powder! Leave her out of this.
Jinx said: Now...
Jinx said to Vi: Where should I sit? That's your choice, really. Make her go away. Please. Send her on her way and... And you can have Powder back.
Caitlyn said: Mm.
Vi said to Jinx: I can't.
Jinx said: Ah.
Vi said to Jinx: No! Powder, listen. We... we can just go. We'll leave and never come back.
Jinx said to Vi: Where would we go?
Jinx said to Jinx: No, no, no. She's not saying that.
Vi said to Jinx: It's true, we'll put this behind us. You'll never have to see him again, Powder.
Jinx said to Silco: What do you have to say about that?
Silco said to Vi: Her name is Jinx!
Silco said to Jinx: She's lying. You'll be with her a day before she realizes you aren't that girl anymore and turns her back on you.
Jinx said: Mm-hmm.
Jinx said to Vi: You aren't lying? You wouldn't lie to me. Not again.
Vi said to Jinx: I'm not lying. I'm on your side. I promise.
Jinx said to Jinx: Shut up! We're talking!

Silco said to Jinx: The topsiders offered me everything. Independence, a seat at the table. All in return for you. They can all burn. Everyone betrays us, Jinx. Vander. Her. They will never understand. It's only us. You're my daughter. I'll never forsake you.
Caitlyn said to Jinx: Drop the gun!
Vi said to Jinx: No. Please. No! Stop!
Caitlyn said to Jinx: Drop the gun.
Vi said to Caitlyn: Wait! She's my sister.
Caitlyn said to Vi: Vi, she's too far gone.
Vi said to Caitlyn: No, no, no. Look out!
Silco said to Jinx: You see, now finish it.
Vi said to Jinx: Damn it! Powder, wake up! Remember who you are! I know you remember! Picture Mylo! Claggor!
Jinx said to Vi: Stop.
Vi said to Jinx: Vander!
Silco said to Jinx: Shut up! Don't listen to her!
Vi said to Jinx: Dad! Mom! Me!
Jinx said: No!
Jinx said to Silco: No... Oh. Oh, no, no, no. I'm sorry... I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I'm sorry.
Silco said to Jinx: I never would have given you to them. Not for anything. Don't cry. You're perfect.
Vi said to Jinx: Powder? It's okay. We'll be okay.
Jinx said to Vi: I thought maybe you could love me like you used to. Even though I'm... different. But you changed too. So... Here's to the new us.
Silco said: We'll show them. We'll show them all.
Mel said: I support Councilor Talis' proposal for peace.
